name: Atrophy
overview: Atrophy is an unrealesed shoot'em up game. The game began life as ATROPHY in 1995 and was originally scheduled for release on A1200/4000 (disk/CD) and CD32 by Guildhall in late 1995. Bitter internal fighting within the development team regarding game design (predominantly gfx and music) and up-front royalty payments resulted in the game's release being continually delayed. Reportedly, central to the internal fighting was team coder Frank Tout (The Art/LSd!)
